text.name: info1
text.text: Is known internationally for three 1980s arcade games: Moon Patrol (1982), the earliest beat 'em up, Kung-Fu Master (1984), and the scrolling shooter R-Type (1987). Irem has been popular in Japan with games like Photoboy for the PC Engine and In the Hunt for arcades.
